alert.note: Alert for Clay; St. Johns (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 25 at 4:13PM EDT until September 25 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jacksonville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western St. Johns County in northeastern Florida... East central Clay County in northeastern Florida... * Until 445 PM EDT. * At 413 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Picolata, or 7 miles south of Green Cove Springs, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Picolata. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
